description: A command-line system information tool written in bash 3.2+.
pre_install: if (installed 'git-with-openssh') { $git = $(scoop prefix 'git-with-openssh') } elseif (installed 'git') { $git = $(scoop prefix 'git') } else { $git = $(Get-Command 'git' | Select Source -ExpandProperty 'Path'| Split-Path -Parent | Split-Path -Parent) }
